name: Carrying articles
text: §291C-146  Carrying articles.  No person operating a bicycle shall carry any package, bundle, or article which prevents the use of both hands in the control and operation of the bicycle.  A person operating a bicycle shall keep at least one hand on the handlebars at all times. [L 1971, c 150, pt of §1; am L 1984, c 273, §13]
